banner.title: Welcome to our Social Event Website
banner.description: Bringing people together to celebrate life's special moments.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.content: We are a passionate team dedicated to creating unforgettable social events. Our mission is to make every moment memorable.

weddings.title: Weddings
weddings.content: We specialize in crafting dream weddings that reflect your unique love story.

birthdays.title: Birthdays
birthdays.content: Celebrate another trip around the sun with a fun and memorable birthday party.

parties.title: Parties
parties.content: From casual get-togethers to themed extravaganzas, we'll help you throw the perfect party.

anniversaries.title: Anniversaries
anniversaries.content: Commemorate your love journey with a romantic and unforgettable anniversary celebration.
